title: 2022 Injury Special, Listener Lineups
description:
Field Yates, Stephania Bell and Daniel Dopp run through all of the key injuries you need to watch out for in Week 1, including if we can expect the same workloads for some star RB’s. Then, Liz Loza joins as the crew evaluates some of your lineups.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Field Yates, Stephania Bell, Mike Clay, Daniel Dopp
itunes:subtitle: Fantasy Focus: Stephania Talks All Of The Injuries And Recoveries You Need To Know For Week 1
